channel.title: FroznFury | Necromancy | Dungeoneering | Economy | Pking | Coming Soon
channel.description:
[center][url=http://froznfury.x10.bz/][img]http://froznfury.x10.bz/img/logo.png[/img][/url]
[b][size=12pt]Links:[/size][/b] [url=http://www.froznfury.x10.bz/]Website[/url] [url=http://www.froznfury.x10.bz/forum/]Forum[/url]
[b][size=14pt]Developers:[/size][/b] [b]Server[/b] - Robbie (me) - Stuart (RiiPiiNFtW)
[b]Client[/b] - Robbie (me)
[b]Community Manager[/b] - Andrew (ox random xi)
[b][size=16pt]Features:[/size][/b]
Green = Done Orange = In progress Red = Not started
[b][size=12pt]Skills[/size]:[/b] [u][b]Working skills:[/b][/u] Attack Defence Strength
Constitution: - Actual lifepoints (Not just c.playerLevel[3]*10)
Prayer: - Actual x10 prayer points (Not just c.playerLevel[5]*10) - Bones on altar - Bone burying - Prayer points draining
Magic: - Most modern spells complete - Some Lunar spells complete - Ancients fully working
Runecrafting: - Atlar teleport tabs - Crafting runes from air - bloos - Crafting multiple runes - Talismans and tiaras
Agility: - Brimhaven agility course - Barbarian agility course - Gnome agility course (No mapdata)
Herblore: - Herb cleaning - 2nd ingrediant grinding - Potion making
Thieving: - Pickpocketing with possible chance of failing depending on your level - Stealing from stalls - Getting caught by guards
Crafting: - Gem crafting - Leather armor making - Tan hiding - Flax picking/making bow strings - Special bolt tip making (Dragon bolts (e))
Fletching: - Long and shortbow fletching - Bow stringing - Bolt making
Slayer: - Gaining slayer points after task - Multiple slayer masters - Duo slayer - Slayer point interfaces for rewards - Cancelling an assignment
Mining: - All rocks (copper - rune) - Rocks disappearing after ore is gone with timer (Timer depends on what type of rock it is)
Smithing: - Bar smelting - Armour making
Fishing: - Fish level requirements - Equipment requirements - Barbarian fishing
Cooking - Cooking level requirements - Cook in ranged and fires (Including player made fires) - Cooking fish - Cooking all except fish
Firemaking: - Making fires with logs (Regular - magic) - Bonfires - Level requirements
Woodcutting: - Level requirements - Tree stumps after cutting tree down - All hatchets (Bronze - dragon, including inferno adze)
Farming: - Herb patches - All patches except herb
[u][b][size=12pt]In progress:[/size][/b][/u] Dungeoneering: - All interfaces - Setting floor number and complexity - Gatestone teleporting - Inviting players to party - Dungeons - Skill activities in dungeons - Puzzles
Summoning: - Summoning familiars - Pouch creation - Scroll creation - Summoning pets - Familiar specials - Summoning points draining when familiar out - Beast of burden
Hunter: - Imp hunting - Butterfly hunting - Box trap hunting - Bird snare hunting - Tracking
Necromancy: - Spells interface - Spells - Reviving monsters
Construction - Flatpacks - Player owned houses
[b]Custom skill: Necromancy[/b] Necromancy is a dark and evil version of the two skills, Summoning and Magic. Spells will be like summoning evil monsters, casting dark spells, and reviving the undead. This is the skill of the Devil. There are three tiers of spells: - Unembellished - Inception - Optimum The spells will require Mana to use them and your Mana will go up as you level the skill. You will gain 10 Mana points per level and will regenerate just like Constitution when you're not using a spell. The spells do not have a required level to use them, instead, you will unlock them with Necromancer tokens. You will gain a token for every four levels you gain. Making it so you have unlocked every spell by the time you have level 99 in the skill. Spells: [code] Unembellished Spells: Revive Undead - Revives a low level monster Heal - 10% of your total Lifepoints Energy Drain - Drains enemies energy Soul Snatcher - Takes the soul of your defeated enemy and turns into mana Circle of Horror - A circle appears under enemy and temporarily distorts your enemy Miasma Blast - Weakens your enemy's attack and defece Fireball - A fireball comes out of the sky and damages your enemy Freeze - A block of ice appears and freezes your enemy for 5 seconds
Inception Spells: Greater Revive - Revives a medium level monster Burned Alive - Inflicts fire damage on your enemy Greater Heal - Heals 20% of your total Lifepoints Paralyze - Stuns your enemy for a short time Death Hex - Deals damage to your enemy every 5 seconds for 45 seconds Lightning - A bolt of electricity damages your enemy Fire Ripple - A wave of fire comes out of the ground towards your enemy Circle of Immobilize - A circle appears under enemy and distracts your enemy and does damage Rain Storm - A cloud appears and rains on your enemy inflicting damage
Optimum Spells: Master Revive - Revives a high level monster Circle of Death - A circle appears under enemy and does a big amount of damage Ultimate Heal - Heals 35% of your total Lifepoints Inflict Destruction - Deals a high amount of damage to your enemy Mass Paralyze - Stuns the enemies around you for a short time Fire Storm - A spinning storm of fire appears and does damage to your enemy 3 times Volcanic Eruption - 4 fireballs fall from the sky and damage your enemy[/code] Of course, these will require different graphics and animations that aren't in my cache, but until I learn to make animations and graphics, or if I find someone who knows how to, I will make do with what I have. For spells like: [code]Revive Undead Greater Revive Master Revive[/code] You will need to unlock each spell in order from weakest to strongest. But, for spells like: [code]Soul Snatcher[/code] That only have 1 spell in the category, will only require the specific spell that you choose to be unlocked. The interface for the spells will be similar to the current magic interfaces, just a little more organized. There will also be a bar drawn on the game screen that shows your Mana whenever you have the Necromancy spell book.
[b]Minigames:[/b] - Standard PI minigames like: - Barrows - Pest Control - Warriors' Guild - Fight Caves & Pits - A form of the Dominion Tower - Bounty Hunter
[u]In progress:[/u] - Champion Scrolls - Archaeology - Team Wars - Team Restorations Vs. Team Destruction - Free-For-All Pk Wars - Fist of Guthix
[u]Not started:[/u] - Duel Tournaments
[b][size=12pt]Quests:[/size][/b] - Cook's Assistant - Doric's Quest - Dragon Slayer - Black Knight's Fortress - Lunar Diplomacy - Others to come
[b]In-Game Activities[/b] Slayer point system with points like RuneScape. For example: You gain 15 points every task. You gain 75 points for every 10 tasks. And for every 100 tasks, you gain 225 points.
[u]In progress:[/u] Squeal of Fortune Solomon's Store Loyalty shop for members Voting for rewards
[b]Other:[/b] Resting Money pouch supports buying and selling to a store. Developers console Members gain 500 loyalty points every 45 minutes
[u][b]In progress:[/b][/u] Having multiple worlds (Free and Members) Aura base Notes system Item searching in-game Quick chat Get skillcapes from actual skill master instead of the Wise old man Front and back loyalty titles
[b]Media:[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/USM1OWk.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/k9xxx0l.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/i6FAJ5D.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lXrW8Hm.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pJMdOm5.png[/img]
HD sprites and sprite hovering support. As well as tooltips. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3SXadcv.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/znmIAaN.png[/img]
The aura base is working, it's just that whenever I enable the aura effects to show, like the wings, the player names bug out and everyone does a weird animation. Also, when wear an aura, it isn't in the correct slot. This is not a sprite and buttons are not being clicked. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1Znw2cl.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZNnSWDM.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ghPomX0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JIOVpQV.png[/img]
If you have noticed, I like making interfaces and quite a bit of people said I'm good at making them. I'd say I'm a decent client developer because I like making the game look better. If anyone wants to apply for a server or client developer, give me a PM. I'm not desperately in need of developers, it'd just be nice so I wouldn't need to do everything.
[/center]
